message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60% and you take 40%.
Let's try a bit more balanced split, 55 for me, 45 for you.
I understand you want a more balanced split. I'm willing to take 55% this time.  The clock is ticking, Bob!
You're getting closer, but I think I deserve a bit more. 57 for me, 43 for you.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob!  I'll come up to 56%, but that's my final offer.
I know you said that was your final offer, but I think I can do better. 58 for me, 42 for you. The inflation is hurting you more than me, Alice.
